```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read.csv("memri.csv")
view(data)
```

## Violin plots 

```{r plots}
graph <- data %>% 
  filter(! is.na(Proportional.Volume)) %>% 
  filter(! is.na(genotype)) %>% 
  filter(genotype != "") %>% 
  group_by(genotype) %>% 
  select(Proportional.Volume, genotype)

ggplot(data = graph, aes(factor(genotype), Proportional.Volume)) +
  geom_violin() +
  labs(x = "Genotype",
       y = "Hippocampal prop. vol. (cubic mm)",
       title = "Distributions of hippocampal proportional volumes by genotype") 
  
```
